'''Resonant Waves''' is [[Zhongli]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The [[Internal Cooldown|ICD]] for triggering this passive either doesn't exist or is extremely negligible.<ref name="A1 ICD">KeqingMains Theorycrafting Library: [https://library.keqingmains.com/evidence/characters/geo/zhongli#zhongli-a1-has-no-negligible-icd Zhongli's A1 Has No/Negligible ICD]</ref>
* Refreshing the shield before it breaks will reset the stacks to 0.<ref name="A1 Broken Down">KeqingMains Theorycrafting Library: [https://library.keqingmains.com/evidence/characters/geo/zhongli#zhongli-a1-has-no-negligible-icd Zhongli's Ascension 1 broken down]</ref>
